extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Systems and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed versions of the listed products.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is updating to TRUMPF License Expert >= V2.0.0 possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update TRUMPF License Expert
extracted_playbook.description: Download and install the latest version of the TRUMPF License Expert software (>= V2.0.0) from trumpf.com/de_DE/produkte/software/software-lizenzierung on all affected servers and workstations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement General Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Apply general security best practices such as network segmentation, endpoint protection, and system hardening.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access to TRUMPF License Expert Server
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the TRUMPF License Expert server component to required clients only by using firewalls or other suitable products.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply System Hardening Measures
extracted_playbook.description: Implement system hardening measures to enhance security posture.
